name: Flux Dust
description:
CURRENTLY ONLY FOR WINDOWS

Due to the feedback I have gotten so far, I have decided to upload a sample of the dungeons and basic combat in the game so far.

 THIS IS NOT EVEN CLOSE TO THE FINISHED PRODUCT (or really even an alpha). 

This is only a showcase of the random dungeon generation and random enemy generation. All donations go directly to funding the games development and coffee.
